divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my friend where out having an airsoft battle when we both herd a humming noise getting louder and louder. then a disk shaped object flew right over his house, he was scared and i was somewhat scared and interested in the object. we both exzamened it with having aztec carvings all around the craft and having the color of meltalic grey. It just stood there hovering over his house with a humming sound for a few minutes then the humming got louder and the craft raized up and flew away into the clouds above us.
trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Columbus
There were no other sightings in Columbus on or around April 18th 2008
Summary: friend and I saw a Disk shaped UFO.
